column3: #14204 is merged. I've rebased on master and addresed @ryanofsky's feedback: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14208#discussion_r217068662

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #10973 (Refactor: separate wallet from node by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
I've addressed the comment in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14208#discussion_r217201465 and force-pushed.
Can you drop g_wallet_init_interface references and throws in this file? They seem redundant if MakeWallet and GetWallets functions can throw now.

```\n2018-09-12 23:23:50 clang-tidy(pr=14208): interfaces/node.cpp:41:7: warning: declaration 'Wallet' is never referenced, but a declaration with the same name found in another namespace 'interfaces' [bugprone-forward-declaration-namespace]\n2018-09-12 23:23:50 clang-tidy(pr=14208): interfaces/node.cpp:41:7: warning: no definition found for 'Wallet', but a definition with the same name 'Wallet'
